message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're offering it at a special introductory price of $120. We hope this aligns well with your expectations and budget.

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  While I appreciate the value of your product, $120 is a bit outside my budget. I'm interested in purchasing, but I'm only able to offer $80 at this time.  Let me know if that works for you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your current budget constraints. In order to accommodate your needs while still ensuring a fair exchange, I propose a revised price of $95 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget. I hope this proposal works for you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to work with me.  $95 is still a little high for me.  I'm firm on my previous offer of $80.  Let me know if you're willing to accept that.

Thank you for your persistence, Bob. Considering the value of the product and your budget constraints, I am willing to offer the product at a price of $90. This is a fair compromise that I hope will meet both our needs.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still only able to offer $85.  This is my final offer.  If it doesn't work for you, I'll need to consider purchasing from John.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to accept an offer of $87 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget and allows us to reach an agreement.
